sources.title: Ten Nights in a Bar-Room (1931) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: William Farnum, Tom Santschi, Patty Lou Lynd
 Director: William A. O'Connor

 A man's heavy drinking drives away his family and threatens to destroy his relationship with his little daughter.

metadata.Plot: A man's heavy drinking drives away his family and threatens to destroy his relationship with his little daughter.
metadata.Writer: Norton S. Parker, Edwin Waugh, Timothy Shay Arthur
metadata.Actors: William Farnum, Tom Santschi, Patty Lou Lynd
